alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 9:21PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...From Sunday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farmland along the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday morning and continue rising to a crest of 20 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 19 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 17.4 Sat 8 pm CDT 19.4 19.8 20.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1130 AM CDT.
